author: remm
msg: - Flush caches when delisting with a failure. Unfortunately, Slide has at the
moment no way of knowing which objects are affected by a rollback, so this
is the only way to clean the cache.

author: remm
msg: - Improve robustness by catching all unhandled throwables and wrapping
- Also fix a problem where a RuntimeException or an Error thrown from a store
wouldn't cause it to be properly delisted with a failure status.

author: cmlenz
msg: Couple of minor additions to the package.html JavaDocs

author: juergen
msg: in case of a ServiceAccessException a 207 was created. Now the 207 decision depends on the nested exception, if available.

author: remm
msg: - Use the new ForceStoreEnlistment flag in COPY, MOVE, PROPPATCH
and PUT, to prevent dirty reads (Juergen, is it doing what it is supposed to be doing ?).
